casebody.data:
The RESERVE REALTY, LLC, et al.
v.
WINDEMERE RESERVE, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2017

Daniel E. Casagrande, in support of petition.

J. Christopher Rooney and Brian A. Daley, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 130, 165 A.3d 162, is granted, limited to the following question:

"In concluding that the purchase and sale agreements forming the basis of the plaintiffs' claim for real estate brokerage fees constituted a tying arrangement in violation of the Connecticut Antitrust Act, General Statutes § 35-24 et seq., did the Appellate Court properly rely on State v. Hossan-Maxwell, Inc., 181 Conn. 655, 436 A.2d 284 (1980) ?"
